name: What color is Andrew Tate's next Bugatti?
description:
Andrew Tate wants to determine the color of his next Bugatti. The next color of his bugatti will be the color that is lacking from the color matrix of Andrew Tate's top g colors, since Andrew Tate already has Bugattis in those colors.

For example, if we have the color string:
```python
color = "White"
```

Then that color must not exist in the list of strings top_g_color:

```python
top_g_color = ["Black", "Copper", "Mahogany"]
```

Don't forget our Bugatti!
```python
bugatti = "Bugatti Chiron Pur Sport"
```

Which in this case, it does not, so then the function when called should return the following string:
```python
andrewTatesBugatti(color, bugatti, top_g_colors) -> "White Bugatti Chiron Pur Sport"
```
